fastformat::mismatched_replacements_exception

mismatched_replacements_exception Class Reference
[Exceptions]

#include <fastformat/exceptions.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for mismatched_replacements_exception:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Root class for all parameter replacement exceptions.

This exception class represents a mismatch between the replacements specified in a format and the arguments presented to the formatting function.

Note:
This class is abstract

Public Types
